document_data.realm year: [[Kythorn]], [[1373 DR]]<ref><ref group="note">The novel is undated, but in Chapter 1 it has been "nearly two years" since events in ''Shadow's Witness'', which is dated to [[Hammer (month)|Hammer]], [[1371 DR]]. Since Hammer is the first month in the [[Calendar of Harptos]], this implies late 1372 DR or Hammer 1373 DR. Apparently some time later, in Chapters 2 to 4, it is spring and in Chapter 9, it is the "seventeenth day of the sixth month", [[Kythorn 17]]. Therefore, Kythorn, 1373 DR is presumed.
